scripts.test: npm run test:prep && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:prep: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.pr: git pull && npm test && npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease
scripts.patch: git pull && npm test && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: git pull && npm test && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: git pull && npm test && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
